application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 3 (submission of details - h) Notwithstanding the approved plans, 1:10 elevations and 1:5 sections of all new fitted furniture, demonstrating relationship with cornices, ceilings, and skirtings) of Listed Building consent LB/24/00930 (Lower ground floor rear extension with internal alterations including lowering of vault and closet wing floors. Replacement of rear conservatory within closet wing and replacement of railings and uPVC external pipework. Cleaning of front elevation and installation of fanlight to front entrance door and replacement finish to lightwell. Removal of lower ground floor security grille and replacement of lightwell stair. Internal alterations including lowering vault and closet wing floors and changes to layout at second and third floors. Installation of new condenser within rear lower ground floor lightwell with plant enclosure (part retrospective)
